ai-mil3.2.6:1.3_0: A senior monk who brought the following:
ai-mil3.2.6:1.4_0: “Great king, form has come to stay.”
ai-mil3.2.6:1.5_0: “What do name and form come to?”
ai-mil3.2.6:1.6_0: “It’s not just the same thing, great king, because that name and form, since such deeds, experience that kind of person.”
ai-mil3.2.6:1.7_0: “Sir, if it is this name and form, since they’re not released from this name and form, then it’s bad.”
ai-mil3.2.6:1.8_0: A senior monk who brought the following:
ai-mil3.2.6:1.9_0: “Now, you’re not freed from desire, ill will, confusion, and fear.
ai-mil3.2.6:1.10_0: But because you have corruption, great king, that’s why they aren’t released.”
ai-mil3.2.6:2.2_0: “Now, great king, if a man were to arrest that woman, I wouldn’t give him that mango grove.
ai-mil3.2.6:2.3_0: Why would that man gained when they’ve attained a staff?”
ai-mil3.2.6:2.6_0: “Sir, suppose that man were to fall back from a mango grove, but that had little mango tree.”
ai-mil3.2.6:2.7_0: “In the same way, there are deeds called ‘posalize with this’. That’s why the legal procedure is found from name and form, and name and form are not released from that.”
ai-mil3.2.6:3.2_0: “Great king, suppose a person were to boat a sal tree of sal trees ...
ai-mil3.2.6:3.4_0: Or they’d arrest a person for the sacred fire and timber, break out of the field, and split the field beverage.’
ai-mil3.2.6:3.5_0: ‘I have no other field. Now I believed in this field, some other fire, and some other field.
ai-mil3.2.6:3.6_0: Why would that man gained when they’ve attained a staff?”
ai-mil3.2.6:3.9_0: “Sir, even if the fire worship was motivated by a fire, I would fasten that man with a staff, who attained a staff.”
ai-mil3.2.6:3.10_0: “In the same way, there are deeds called ‘posalize with this’. That’s why the legal procedure is found from name and form, and name and form are not released from that.”
ai-mil3.2.6:4.2_0: “Great king, if a person had took a stilt longhouse and set it out by the wind, where they meditated spreading a grass torch, venerate it, and burn it with grass and cremate it in the village, town, or village, town, or royal capital seeking a meal. That fire would it be appropriate for you to meditate and old.
ai-mil3.2.6:4.5_0: “Even if that fire wouldn’t still be extinguished, I wouldn’t be extinguished.”
ai-mil3.2.6:4.6_0: “In the same way, even though Māra has dropped such name and form, they have no such name and form. Though that’s been extinguished, there’s no such thing as this.”
ai-mil3.2.6:5.2_0: “Great king, if a man were to giving a young carts, he would place it on.
ai-mil3.2.6:5.3_0: After some time that man giving dried up, withered eyes, and that man might come back from here?
ai-mil3.2.6:5.4_0: If I were to say that there’s a young brahmin who is young, but only a young brahmin lady. Because of youth, my girl, I’d make you a large responsibility, and your slaves and workers, your servants, and workers might take those who have been given to me.
ai-mil3.2.6:5.5_0: or whose wice do you remember?”
ai-mil3.2.6:5.8_0: “Even if that filthy, they would still be extinguished together.”
ai-mil3.2.6:5.9_0: “In the same way, even though Māra has dropped such name and form, they have no such name and form. Both them, they’re exempt from that place.”
ai-mil3.2.6:6.2_0: “Great king, if a cowherd had some milk-rice prepared a cow, he would put his rope around it by hand and go onto it, and then give it back.
ai-mil3.2.6:6.3_0: That’s how he came out my house.’
ai-mil3.2.6:6.5_0: ‘Now I’d say that this is my hand, give my milk.’
ai-mil3.2.6:6.6_0: Would that man remember that milk, curds, honey, and syrup?”
ai-mil3.2.6:6.9_0: “Even if that’s self they’d still be extinguished together.”
ai-mil3.2.6:6.10_0: “In the same way, even though Māra has dropped such name and form, they have no such name and form. Though that are extinguished, he’s not exempt from places of loss, bad places, the underworld.”
ai-mil3.2.6:8.1_0: The sixth section on name and form.
